headline: Pray with millions around the world and multiply your blessings
inviteFriendsDescription: Invite your friends to pray with you and multiply your blessings.
scanQRCode: Ask your friend to scan the code below:
shareLink: Share this link with your friends:
leaderboardDescription: See how you rank against your friends and the world.
howToProgressFasterDescription: IMPORTANT: If you want to progress faster in levels, pray the Holy Rosary with others; their prayers will also count toward your progress.
todaysChallengeDescription: Pray the Rosary with a friend and multiply your blessings.
todaysChallengeDescription2: Pray the rosary to complete the today's challenge.
removeFriendDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} as friend?
helpUs: Help share the love for the Holy Rosary
deleteAccountConfirmation: Do you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be lost.
deleteAccountQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
